jobs.title: Warehouse Operative
jobs.brief: Picking, packing, and general warehouse duties in a fast-paced environment.
jobs.description: Join our busy warehouse team in Leicester as a Warehouse Operative. This is an excellent opportunity for someone looking to start immediately in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. You'll be working with a friendly team in a modern warehouse facility.
responsibilities: Pick and pack orders accurately and efficiently
Operate warehouse equipment including scanners and trolleys
Follow health and safety procedures at all times
Work collaboratively with team members to meet daily targets
requirements: Previous warehouse experience preferred but not essential
Ability to lift up to 25kg regularly
Good attention to detail and accuracy
Reliable and punctual with strong work ethic

jobs.title: Production Assistant
jobs.brief: Assembly line work in manufacturing facility. Previous experience preferred.
jobs.description: We're looking for a reliable Production Assistant to join our night shift team at our modern manufacturing facility in Coventry. Full training will be provided for the right candidate. This role offers consistent hours and the opportunity to develop manufacturing skills.
responsibilities: Work on assembly line following standard operating procedures
Quality check products to ensure they meet specifications
Maintain clean and organized work area
Record production data and report any issues
Follow all health and safety guidelines
Support team members to achieve production targets
requirements: Previous manufacturing or assembly experience preferred
Good attention to detail and manual dexterity
Ability to stand for extended periods

jobs.title: Office Administrator
jobs.brief: Full-time office role handling admin duties, filing, and customer service.
jobs.description: Join our growing Leicester office as an Office Administrator. This permanent position offers excellent career development opportunities in a supportive environment. Initially starting as a temporary position with the opportunity to become permanent for the right candidate.
responsibilities: Handle general administrative duties and correspondence
Answer phones and provide excellent customer service
Support various departments with ad-hoc projects
requirements: Strong organizational and time management abilities
GCSE English and Maths or equivalent

jobs.title: Forklift Driver
jobs.brief: Experienced FLT driver needed for busy distribution center.

jobs.title: Customer Service Representative
jobs.brief: Handle customer inquiries via phone and email. Great communication skills required.

jobs.title: General Labourer
jobs.brief: Physical work including lifting, moving materials, and basic maintenance tasks.

jobs.title: Machine Operator
jobs.brief: Operating manufacturing machinery. Previous machine operation experience preferred.

jobs.title: Accounts Assistant
jobs.brief: Support accounts team with invoicing, data entry, and basic bookkeeping.

jobs.title: Security Guard
jobs.brief: Overnight security duties at commercial premises. SIA license required.

jobs.title: Team Leader
jobs.brief: Lead a small team in warehouse operations. Leadership experience essential.

jobs.title: Data Entry Clerk
jobs.brief: Accurate data input and database maintenance. Good computer skills required.

jobs.title: Cleaner
jobs.brief: Commercial cleaning duties in office buildings. Flexible hours available.
